00014 #ifndef ULIB_EVENT_TIME_H
00015 #define ULIB_EVENT_TIME_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/timeval.h>
00018 
00019 #ifdef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00020 #       include <ulib/libevent/event.h>
00021 extern U_EXPORT struct event_base* u_ev_base;
00022 #endif
00023 
00024 class U_EXPORT UEventTime : public UTimeVal {
00025 public:
00026 
00027         struct timeval ctime;
00028 
00029         void reset() { ctime.tv_sec = ctime.tv_usec = 0L; }
00030 
00031         UEventTime(long sec = 0L, long usec = 0L) : UTimeVal(sec, usec)
00032                 {
00033                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEventTime, "%ld,%ld", sec, usec)
00034 
00035                 reset();
00036 
00037 #       ifdef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00038                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(u_ev_base)
00039 
00040                 pevent = U_NEW(UTimerEv<UEventTime>(*this));
00041 
00042                 (void) UDispatcher::add(*pevent, *(UTimeVal*)this);
00043 #       endif
00044                 }
00045 
00046         virtual ~UEventTime()
00047                 {
00048                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEventTime)
00049 
00050 #       ifdef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00051                 UDispatcher::del(pevent);
00052                                          delete pevent;
00053 #       endif
00054                 }
00055 
00056         bool operator<(const UEventTime& t) const;
00057 
00058         // SERVICES
00059 
00060         bool isOld() const;
00061         void setCurrentTime();
00062         void setTimerVal(struct timeval* it_value);
00063 
00064         time_t expire() { return (ctime.tv_sec + tv_sec); }
00065 
00066         // -------------------------------------------
00067         // method VIRTUAL to define
00068         // -------------------------------------------
00069         // return value: -1 -> normal, 0 -> monitoring
00070         // -------------------------------------------
00071 
00072         virtual int handlerTime() { return -1; }
00073 
00074 #ifdef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00075         UTimerEv<UEventTime>* pevent;
00076 
00077         void operator()(int fd, short event);
00078 #endif
00079 
00080         friend U_EXPORT ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UEventTime& t);
00081 
00082 #ifdef DEBUG
00083         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 private:
00087         UEventTime(const UEventTime&) : UTimeVal() {}
00088         UEventTime& operator=(const UEventTime&)         { return *this; }
00089 };
00090 
00091 #endif
